citations.narrative:
During inspection it was noted the the two bottles of Ivermectin in the refrigerator expired in 2022. There is also no
records of when Ivermectin was giving this year. The schedule that is approved by the veterinarian in the PVC is that all
adult dogs should receive monthly Ivermectin. At this time it must be concluded that either the schedule is not being
followed or it is, expired medication was used.
Treatment of internal parasites, including heartworm, must be given in accordance with a schedule approved by the
attending veterinarian.
Correction Date: May 24, 2024
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative.
n

narrative:
3.13(a)(3) 
   
Veterinary care for dogs. 
During inspection it was noted the the two bottles of Ivermectin in the refrigerator expired in 2022. There is also no 
records of when Ivermectin was giving this year. The schedule that is approved by the veterinarian in the PVC is that all 
adult dogs should receive monthly Ivermectin. At this time it must be concluded that either the schedule is not being 
followed or it is, expired medication was used.  
Treatment of internal parasites, including heartworm, must be given in accordance with a schedule approved by the 
attending veterinarian.  
Correction Date: May 24, 2024 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative. 
 
 n
